## Aufgabe 1: Konstrukte
### a.
```{r}
df = data.frame(rnorm(100, mean=50, s=20))
count <- 0;
min(df)
max(df)
for (i in df[[1]]) {
  if (i < 60) {
  } else {
    count <- count + 1
  }
}
count
```

### c.
```{r}
is.sorted = function(x) {
  index = 1
  toReturn = TRUE
  for (val in tail(x, -1)) {
    if (val < x[index]) toReturn = FALSE
    index = index + 1
  }
  toReturn
  
}
is.sorted(c(1:9))
```


```{r}
is.sorted(c(9:1))
```


```{r}
is.sorted(c(4:20, 19:4))
```
